title: Compare views on Dutch commerce SAQ

content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A and B. Describe ONE important difference between the views of commerce and prosperity expressed in the two passages. For EACH of the passages, identify and explain ONE factor (such as a historical development, an intellectual or philosophical trend, or a religious belief) that likely informed the view of commerce and prosperity expressed in that passage.

frqParts.text: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A and B. Describe ONE important difference between the views of commerce and prosperity expressed in the two passages. For EACH of the passages, identify and explain ONE factor (such as a historical development, an intellectual or philosophical trend, or a religious belief) that likely informed the view of commerce and prosperity expressed in that passage.

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain the point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience of a source.
